CustomField.formula: IF( Cancelled__c = True, "Cancelled", IF( Product_Sold__c = True, "Product Sold", IF( NOT(ISNULL( Product_Return_Date__c )) , "Product Returned", IF( NOT( ISNULL( Requested_Pick_Up_Date_Time__c ) ) , "Requested Pick Up", IF(NOT( ISNULL( Shipment_Date__c ) ), "Product Shipped", TEXT(Approval_Status__c) ) ) ) ))
CustomField.label: Evaluation Status
